### Research Question
Who is the greatest basketball player to ever play, according to statistics?

### Packages

```{r}
# clean up workspace environment
rm(list = ls())

# all packages used for the assignment
library(mosaic)
library(tidyverse)
library(DataComputing)
library(rvest)
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)
```

### Data Access

```{r}
page <- "https://www.basketball-reference.com/players/b/bryanko01.html"
tableList <- page %>%
  read_html() %>%
  html_nodes(css = "table") %>%
  html_table(fill = TRUE)
KobeBryant <- tableList[[1]]
KobeBryant
```
```{r}
page <- "https://www.basketball-reference.com/players/j/jamesle01.html"
tableList <- page %>%
  read_html() %>%
  html_nodes(css = "table") %>%
  html_table(fill = TRUE)
LebronJames <- tableList[[1]]
LebronJames
```
```{r}
page <- "https://www.basketball-reference.com/players/j/jordami01.html"
tableList <- page %>%
  read_html() %>%
  html_nodes(css = "table") %>%
  html_table(fill = TRUE)
MichaelJordan <- tableList[[1]]
MichaelJordan
```

###Joining the data tables together
```{r}
AllPlayers <-
  left_join(KobeBryant, LebronJames, by='Age') %>%
                left_join(., MichaelJordan, by='Age') 
AllPlayers
```


### General data wrangling
```{r}
AllPlayers%>%
  select('Age','3P.x','2P.x','AST.x','3P.y','2P.y','AST.y','3P','2P','AST')



```


### Reduction Function
```{r}
AllPlayers %>%
  '3P.x' <- as.numeric(as.double('3P.x'))


```
